alert.note: Alert for Greene; Pickens; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 09 at 4:12PM CST until March 12 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Pickens and Sumter Counties. .Flooding continues on the Tombigbee River and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by Thursday morning, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From this evening to Saturday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 122.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:00 PM CST Wednesday was 122.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 123.9 feet Thursday evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Friday evening. - Flood stage is 122.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
